adrFormatAddress: 517 W 134th St, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: I have been to a few different physical therapy places and this place by far supersedes those I’ve been to. First and foremost the ease in getting a quick appointment was incredible. Dolly at the front desk is very helpful and an absolute pleasure to deal with. Place is very clean and the staff wipes down equipment after use.  My therapist Berzisht Hilloowala was absolutely fantastic. Very knowledgeable and patient and is a great listener to my concerns. Definitely helped me with my knee issues. I would recommend this location to anyone who needs physical therapy. I must also say that  the assistants are also fantastic and just so nice and helpful.

text.text: I have been to a few different physical therapy places and this place by far supersedes those I’ve been to. First and foremost the ease in getting a quick appointment was incredible. Dolly at the front desk is very helpful and an absolute pleasure to deal with. Place is very clean and the staff wipes down equipment after use.  My therapist Berzisht Hilloowala was absolutely fantastic. Very knowledgeable and patient and is a great listener to my concerns. Definitely helped me with my knee issues. I would recommend this location to anyone who needs physical therapy. I must also say that  the assistants are also fantastic and just so nice and helpful.

originalText.text: My daughter has been getting Physical Therapy in the 134th street location since last year because of my daughter's school. However,   this is a little smaller than the one in 100th Street . It is kept very clean and the bathroom is very clean. Some of the staff have been very kind and friendly all the time.  Most of all, Mr.Berzisht is the best Physical Therapist , my daughter had  and I am greatful to God for it. Mr.Berzisht has immense knowledge and a lot of patience. Even though he had to treat patients one after the other, I never saw him get impatient, he is very genuine in providing treatments and he is there to serve and excellent for kids.   Get Physical Therapy at Triumph, you will not be disappointed.

originalText.text: Friendly staff and fantastic physical therapist. I find that they always go above to accommodate patients between scheduling and sessions. Very happy with their services, helping me through two different injuries in the past year.

text.text: Friendly staff and fantastic physical therapist. I find that they always go above to accommodate patients between scheduling and sessions. Very happy with their services, helping me through two different injuries in the past year.

originalText.text: If you're in Harlem and need PT come here. Dr Sheraz is the BEST. Always nice and professional. I've been coming to him off and on for almost 10 years . His assistant is super friendly and professional as well . Short wait time as well

originalText.text: Love Triumph!!! This located have the best staff and amazing physical therapists. A special shout out to Berzisht for being patient and working hard with me to regain my mobility!!! Also to Dolly and Angie for making this place feel like home!!!!
